Aspect Specific

ToDo:

  • Set predefine aspect class or set css attribute padding-bottom in percentage by formula "((height / width) * 100).toFixed(2)" on <div class="size"></div>.

Example settings:

  • Aspect: 1920x800 (41.67%)
  • background-position: center center;
  • background-size: cover;
